pregnancy.title: Pregnancy Management
pregnancy.description: Track active and completed pregnancies, monitor development, and manage breeding records

notFound.title: Pregnancy Not Found
notFound.description: The requested pregnancy could not be found
notFound.message: The pregnancy you are looking for doesn't exist or has been archived.

checklist.title: Pregnancy Symptoms Tracker
checklist.description: Check off symptoms as you observe them in {{femaleName}}'s pregnancy
checklist.errorMessage: Please try refreshing the page or contact support if the problem persists.
checklist.noData: Unable to load symptom tracker. Please try again.

journey.title: {{femaleName}}'s Pregnancy
journey.description: Track development and symptoms week by week
journey.noChecklist: No checklist items for this week

alert.signIn: Sign in to save your checklist data across devices

checklist.title: Week {{weekNumber}}
checklist.noSymptoms: No symptoms to track for this week

week1.title: Fertilization & Early Development
week1.description: The eggs are fertilized and begin their journey to the uterus.

week2.title: Implantation
week2.description: Embryos implant in the uterine wall and begin developing.
keyPoints: No visible signs of pregnancy yet

week3.title: Organ Formation Begins
week3.description: Basic organ systems start to form in the developing puppies.
keyPoints: Organs begin to form in embryos
Slightly enlarged nipples may be noticeable

week4.title: Heartbeat Development
week4.description: Puppy hearts begin beating and can be detected via ultrasound.
keyPoints: Heartbeats can be detected via ultrasound

week5.title: Limb Development
week5.description: Limbs and facial features begin to develop more distinctly.

week6.title: Rapid Growth Phase
week6.description: Puppies enter a period of rapid growth and development.

week7.title: Coat Development
week7.description: Puppy coats begin to develop and take on their characteristic colors.
keyPoints: Puppies have fur starting to grow
Puppies can be felt moving in abdomen

week8.title: Final Development
week8.description: Puppies are nearly fully developed and preparing for birth.

week9.title: Birth Preparation
week9.description: Final preparations for birth. Labor may begin any day now.
keyPoints: Temperature drops below 100°F (37.8°C) 24-48 hours before labor

item1.description: May eat less or become slightly pickier as hormone levels begin to shift.

item2.description: May seem somewhat more tired or calm due to early hormonal changes.

item1.description: Slight nausea or vomiting due to hormonal changes, usually in the morning.

item2.description: More affectionate or distant, may seek or avoid contact more than usual.

item1.description: Small amount of clear or whitish discharge may appear when embryos implant.

item2.text: Bitch's body begins adapting to pregnancy
item2.description: Body undergoes early adaptations to support the growing pregnancy.

item1.description: Nipples become larger, rounder and darker in color.

item2.description: Slight increase in body weight as pregnancy progresses.

item3.description: Ultrasound examination to confirm pregnancy, count fetuses and check heartbeats (day 25-35).

item1.description: Appetite increases as hormone levels stabilize and fetal growth accelerates.

item2.description: Increase food amount by approximately 10-15% per week forward, based on the bitch's needs and condition.
Some may feel slight movement during gentle palpation, but more common in weeks 7-8.

item3.description: Continue adjusting food amount according to the bitch's needs and development.

item4.text: Prepare whelping box in a quiet place
item4.description: Place whelping box in a quiet, secure location and familiarize the bitch with it now.

item1.description: Belly is clearly distended; pregnancy very visible.

item2.description: May begin arranging bedding, digging or seeking quiet areas.

item1.description: Clear discharge may increase slightly as body prepares for labor.

item2.description: Prepare equipment for temperature monitoring and weighing puppies.

item3.description: Prepare heating pad or heat lamp with protection for the puppies.

item4.description: Gather gloves, scissors, sterile umbilical cord thread, towels and disinfectant.

item5.description: Ensure you have the veterinarian's contact information easily accessible.

item6.description: Prepare clean, washed textiles for the whelping box and birthing.

item7.description: X-ray examination to count number of puppies and assess size (day 55-58).

item1.description: Rectal temperature drops below 100°F (37.8°C) 12-24 hours before labor.

item2.description: Difficulty settling, increased panting and pacing.

item3.description: Appetite may disappear shortly before labor begins.

item4.description: Strong contractions followed by delivery of puppies.

item5.text: Have crate ready for emergency transport
item5.description: Prepare transport option to veterinarian if needed.

item6.text: Prepare energy and fluid supplements for the bitch
item6.description: Have nutritious supplements ready for the bitch during and after whelping.

item7.description: Family member, friend or mentor should be available if needed.

addPregnancy.title: Add New Pregnancy
addPregnancy.expectedDueDateLabel: Expected Due Date (63 days from mating)
addPregnancy.description: Create a new pregnancy record for a dog that has already been mated.

managePregnancy.title: Manage Pregnancy
managePregnancy.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this pregnancy?

completedPregnancies.reactivatedToast: {{femaleName}}'s pregnancy has been reactivated and moved to active pregnancies.
completedPregnancies.reactivationFailedToast: There was a problem reactivating the pregnancy.
completedPregnancies.unexpectedErrorToast: An unexpected error occurred while reactivating the pregnancy.
completedPregnancies.inactiveDescription: This pregnancy was completed and is no longer active. You can reactivate it if needed.

activePregnancies.title: No Active Pregnancies
activePregnancies.description: Add a pregnancy to start tracking

allPregnancies.title: No Pregnancies
allPregnancies.description: Start by adding your first pregnancy

validation.invalidTemperatureDescription: Please enter a valid temperature value.
validation.titleRequiredDescription: Please enter a title for the observation.
validation.descriptionRequiredDescription: Please enter a description of what you observed.

success.pregnancyAddedDescription: The pregnancy has been successfully added

error.failedToAddPregnancyDescription: There was a problem adding the pregnancy
error.enterExternalMaleName: Please enter a name for the external male

dialog.title: Manage Pregnancy
dialog.description: What would you like to do with {{femaleName}}'s pregnancy?

complete.title: Complete Pregnancy
complete.description:
Are you sure you want to mark this pregnancy as completed?

Completed pregnancies will be removed from your active pregnancies list, but can be retrieved later if needed. This will also free up the female dog for a new pregnancy.

delete.title: Delete Pregnancy
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this pregnancy? This action cannot be undone and all pregnancy data including temperature logs and symptom records will be permanently removed.
